sources.title: Murder on the Campus
sources.description: Taken from IMDB : A popular young student finds herself accused of a series of murders that have occurred on the college campus. Her boyfriend, a reporter for the local newspaper, knows she didn't do it, and and sets out to prove her innocence and catch the real killer.

sources.title: Murder on the Campus
sources.description: You can find more information regarding this film on its IMDb page .

sources.title: Murder on the Campus (1933) PRE-CODE HOLLYWOOD
sources.description:
Stars: Shirley Grey, Charles Starrett, J. Farrell MacDonald
 Director: Richard Thorpe

 A popular young student finds herself accused of a series of murders that have occurred on the college campus. Her boyfriend, a reporter for the local newspaper, knows she didn't do it, and and sets out to prove her innocence and catch the real killer.

metadata.Plot: A popular young student finds herself accused of a series of murders that have occurred on the college campus. Her boyfriend, a reporter for the local newspaper, knows she didn't do it, and sets out to prove her innocence and catch the real killer.
metadata.Actors: Shirley Grey, Charles Starrett, J. Farrell MacDonald
